game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Sprite
      • game.Character
        • game.Player

  • public class Player
extends Character
    The player. Has ability to attack in an arc around it with a sword, deflect bullets, dash forward, and slow down time
    Author:
    epedley885
